title: The Birth of Samson
summary: Judges 13 introduces Samson’s parents. An angel tells them they will have a special child under a Nazirite vow from birth. His life will begin the deliverance of Israel from the Philistines.

faq.question: Who were Samson’s parents?
faq.answer: A barren couple from the tribe of Dan; the angel appears to his mother first.

faq.question: What was special about Samson’s birth?
faq.answer: He was set apart as a Nazirite from the womb to deliver Israel.
